description: Security role or group identifier to which this access record applies; used to group users for access control.
Code representing the specific application function or module governed by this access record; used to evaluate permissions for the group.
Grant indicator for the group on this function (e.g., Y/N); determines whether access is allowed.
User who created this group-permission record (audit field).
Timestamp when this group-permission record was created (audit field).
User who last modified this group-permission record (audit field).
Timestamp of the most recent update to this group-permission record (audit field).
